entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
AREAS OF FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
AREAS OF FOG IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
